bibl.title: Multiple Copies of Literary Papyri, Fiber Patterns, and P. Oxy. XLVIII 3376 fr. 44.
bibl.note: Replies to: Theodore F. BRUNNER, P. Oxy. XLVIII 3376 Fr. 44, ZPE 69 (1987) pp. 228-229. - "Professor Brunner deduced two copies of Herodotus Book 2 by the same scribe. Unfortunately, this example must now be set aside." P. Oxy. XLVIII, 3376, fr. 44 is in fact two pieces; lines 1-6 derive from the same roll as frr. 11-16.
JOHNSON William Allen, Multiple Copies of Literary Papyri, Fiber Patterns, and P. Oxy. XLVIII 3376 fr. 44.
